description: Wild ginger (Asarum caudatum) is an amazing plant species. It is incredibly easy to grow, the attractive heart-shaped leaves and bell-shaped flowers will provide your garden with a unique texture. Its low-maintenance, and you can enjoy it in shady areas. It is also deer-resistant, and an excellent choice for a woodland garden. The plant is a perfect groundcover, while its flowers are quite delightful, with a wonderful spicy fragrance. Wild ginger is also very beneficial for pollinators, and can add a splash of colour and texture to any landscape. All in all, this plant is a great addition to any garden!
